name: EUROPEAN MEDICINES VERIFICATION ORGANISATION
goal: The European Medicines Verification Organisation (EMVO) is a Belgian non-profit organisation representing stakeholders united in securing the legal supply chain from falsified medicines. Its founding members are EFPIA, the European Federation of Pharmaceutical Industries and Associations, Medicines for Europe, the European Generic and Biosimilar Medicines Association, PGEU, the Pharmaceutical Group of the European Union, GIRP, the European Healthcare Distribution Association and EAEPC, the European Association of Euro-Pharmaceutical Companies.
euInitiatives: According to the Delegated Regulation (EU) 2016/161 Marketing Authorization Holders (MAHs) and Parallel Distributors shall place on the outer packaging of their medicinal products a unique identifier and upload related information to a repositories system. The repositories system composed of a central information and data router (EU Hub) and national repositories which shall be connected to the EU Hub.
